column4: hey , i ve got problem with grub, i need a piece of advice cause he turtorials does not assume having 2 hard drives with 2 systems
im on linux live cd right now, when i type find /boot/grub/stage1     i guess it shows me the windows root disk
i ve got 2 disk- on on there is linux(which i try to get back) and windows7 on second disk
running fdisk -l will let you see all of your drives and what partitions/filesystems they're using.
